entry.title: Most of the recommendation algorithm will be made open source today. The rest will follow. Acid test is that independent third parties should be able ...
entry.summary:
Most of the recommendation algorithm will be made open source today. The rest will follow. Acid test is that independent third parties should be able to determine, with reasonable accuracy, what will probably be shown to users. No doubt, many embarrassing issues will beâ€¦ https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1641874582473695246
